comment: A minor child deserves privacy and should be kept out of politics . Pamela Karlan , you should be ashamed of your very angry and obviously biased public pandering , and using a child to do it .

comment: Pamela Karlan has no children of her own . Therefore this mean & nasty woman does not have the compassion or intelligence to comprehend how horribly wrong she was to attack Barron . Nor will she have the common sense to apologize . Her hatred and ignorance consumes her .
